meta-content-home: Welcome to the personal portfolio web application of Yevhen Dovhan, front-end developer. Browse through a collection of my web projects. Explore the portfolio and discover the work, contact me if you have job propositions.
meta-content-about: About page - Yevhen Dovhan portfolio web application. I really like building things for the web, and always try to expand my knowledge
hero-desc-p1: I'M A FRONT-END DEVELOPER BASED IN KYIV, UKRAINE. I'M BUILDING THINGS FOR THE WEB. I LIKE NEW TECHNOLOGIES, ALWAYS SEEKING NEW KNOWLEDGE.
hero-desc-p2: CURRENTLY, I'M FOCUSING ON BUILDING ACCESSIBLE, PURPOSEFULL WEB APPLICATIONS.
vue: Progressive JavaScript Framework. An approachable, performant and versatile framework for building web user interfaces.
nuxt: The Intuitive Web Framework. An open source framework under MIT license that makes web development simple and powerful.
js: is a widely-used programming language for web development, enabling interactive and dynamic features on websites.
ts: adds additional syntax to JavaScript to support a tighter integration with your editor. Catch errors early in your editor.
vuex: is a state management pattern + library for Vue.js applications. It serves as a centralized store for all the components in an application.
pinia: the intuitive store for Vue.js Type Safe, Extensible, and Modular by design. Forget you are even using a store.
html: is the backbone of the web. It is a markup language used to structure the content of web pages.
css: is a crucial component of web development. It is used to control the presentation and styling of web pages.
contact-me-title: For more information feel free send me a message
about-text-p1: Hi there! I'm a front-end developer with more then one year of experience, specializing in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue.js, Vuex, Pinia, Nuxt.js, REST API, GIT, and related technologies.
about-text-p2: As a team player, I enjoy collaborating with others and am always open to learning from my colleagues. I'm a good listener and a friendly person, which helps me communicate effectively with anyone, regardless of their technical background. Whether I'm working on a new project or maintaining an existing one, I always strive to deliver high-quality code that meets the requirements of the business and the end-users. I'm passionate about web development and love to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in the field.
about-text-p3: I am currently actively seeking new job opportunities, and I am open to any exciting projects that may come my way. If you are interested in working together, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
contact-text-p1: I can help to design and build you next website. Contact me for more detailed information.
contact-text-p2: Maybe your company have an open web developer position, related to my skills.
meta-content-contact: Get in touch with Yevhen Dovhan for collaborations, inquiries, or to discuss potential projects. Contact Yevhen Dovhan via email or through the any social platform.
meta-content-work: Work page - Yevhen Dovhan portfolio web application. Here you can explore my recent projects, position jobs
